__inputs.name: VAR_CW_COMPANY_ID
__inputs.label: Your MSP's company ID as it is in ConnectWise Manage

__inputs.name: VAR_RANDOM_DELAY
__inputs.label: Random delay, between zero and $random_delay seconds

targets.rawSql:
DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 0 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 1 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [Date_Closed_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 0 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [ResourceList] IN (
        SELECT [Member_ID]
        FROM
            [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_system_member]
        WHERE
            [Inactive_Flag] = 0 AND
            [Member_Class] = 'F' AND
            [Member_Name] LIKE '%#%' AND
            [Date_Hire] IS NOT NULL
    )

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 0 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [ResourceList] IS NULL

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 0 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [IsInSLA] = 0 AND
    [SR_Urgency_Name] = (
        SELECT TOP 1 [SR_Urgency_Name]
        FROM
            [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
        ORDER BY [SR_Urgency_Name]
    )

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 0 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [Last_Update_UTC] < GETUTCDATE() - 3 AND
    [Status_Name] NOT IN ('Scheduled') AND
    [Status_Name] NOT LIKE '%wait%'

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 1 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [Date_Entered_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT [Closed_By], COUNT(*) AS 'Closed Count'
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [Closed_Flag] = 1 AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [Date_Closed_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5 AND
    [Hours_Actual] > 0
GROUP BY [Closed_By]
ORDER BY 'Closed Count' DESC

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT
    Member_Name,
    SUM([Hours_Actual]) AS 'Sum_Hours_Actual'
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_time_entry]
WHERE
    [Time_Start] > GETUTCDATE() - 0.5 AND
    [Time_End] < GETUTCDATE() + 0.5
GROUP BY [Member_Name]
ORDER BY 'Sum_Hours_Actual' DESC

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT
    $__timeGroup([Date_Entered_UTC], '1d', 0) AS 'time',
    ISNULL(COUNT([SR_Service_RecID]), 0) AS 'Opened Tickets'
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    $__timeFilter([Date_Entered_UTC])
GROUP BY
    $__timeGroup([Date_Entered_UTC], '1d', 0)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup([Date_Entered_UTC], '1d', 0)

DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT
    $__timeGroup([Date_Closed_UTC], '1d', 0) AS 'time',
    ISNULL(COUNT([SR_Service_RecID]), 0) AS 'Closed Tickets'
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    $__timeFilter([Date_Closed_UTC])
GROUP BY $__timeGroup([Date_Closed_UTC], '1d', 0)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup([Date_Closed_UTC], '1d', 0)

panels.description: Hours logged on this week's timesheet

targets.rawSql:
DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT [Member_Name], [TS_Hours]
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_time_sheet]
WHERE
    [Date_End] < GETDATE() + 7 AND
    [Date_Start] > GETDATE() - 7
ORDER BY [TS_Hours] DESC

panels.title: Hours Logged This Week

targets.rawSql:
DECLARE @RandomDelay INT = ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % (${random_delay}-1)) WAITFOR DELAY @RandomDelay
SELECT
    [SR_SubType_Name],
    COUNT(*) AS 'Ticket Types'
FROM
    [${cw_db_name}].[dbo].[v_api_collection_service_ticket]
WHERE
    [Board_Name] IN(${cw_board:sqlstring}) AND
    [parentTicketId] IS NULL AND
    [SR_SubType_Name] IS NOT NULL AND
    [Date_Entered_UTC] > GETUTCDATE() - 7
GROUP BY [SR_SubType_Name]
ORDER BY 'Ticket Types' DESC

list.label: Your MSP's company ID as it is in ConnectWise Manage
list.name: cw_company_id

list.label: Random delay, between zero and $random_delay seconds
